thread.title: Trip to MSG
thread.title_full: Trip to MSG - Review of Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jsims74
title: Trip to MSG
text: My wife and I stayed here for 1 night for an event at MSG we were attending. Great location, clean rooms, nice staff. The only negative is that, at least in the room we stayed in, is how the bathroom door is constructed, provided you little to no privacy. But that's only a minor issue. We would definitely stay here again.
